title: How the Celsius Affair Plays Into the U.S. Crypto Regulatory Debate

title: Multichain ceases operations after CEO’s sister’s arrest holding $220 million
description: Multichain, a bridging protocol, has confirmed that it has ceased operations as CEO Zhaojun’s sister was arrested recently by the Chinese police while holding $220 million of the protocol’s funds.
